title: Alan Systems Hackathon 2025
description: A full-day internal hackathon focused on AI-powered business process automation.

title: Healthy Coding: Ergonomics at the Desk
description: Workshop on maintaining physical well-being during long hours of coding. Led by a physiotherapist.

title: Alan Run: Tech Sprint Challenge
description: Join the Alan Systems team in a friendly 5K run around Rybnik Park. Open to employees and their families.

title: Autumn IT Conference Prep Meetup
description: Pre-conference strategy session for the team representing Alan Systems at upcoming European IT events.

title: Alan Systems Yoga Day
description: Start your morning with guided yoga sessions designed for IT professionals. Mats provided.

title: Board Games and Pizza Night
description: Unwind after work with board games and hot pizza. Bring your favorite game!

title: Mental Health Awareness Week
description: A series of talks and sessions highlighting mental wellness in tech environments.

title: Tech Talks: Trends in Cloud Development
description: Internal mini-conference on emerging technologies in cloud-based software. Presentations by Alan Systems devs.

title: Ping Pong Tournament
description: Compete with your teammates in a friendly ping pong tournament. Trophies for winners!

title: Coding for a Cause: Charity Sprint
description: One-day coding sprint to build a tool for a local NGO. Collaboration and coffee guaranteed.
